name: Reach Your Dreams picture in frame
description:
Special introductory price! £10!!

This gorgeous handdrawn picture in 8 x 6 frame reads:

A little girl pointed up into the sky and said, 
"look daddy, a balloon! Isn't he lonely up there?"
Daddy looked and there it was, soaring higher and higher. He replied, 
"no my love, he is just trying to reach his dreams".

Handwritten, drawn and made up with love by me :o)

Perfect for your little one's wall, to encourage them to reach for the stars!

**Please note**
All my items are handmade and are NOT toys. Please keep out of children's reach.

name: Six Little Ducks mobile
description:
Six little ducks went swimming one day, on a beautiful pond of love :O)

Each colourful duck measures approx 3 inches long and mobile hangs approx 11 inches long. Although each will differ slightly in length. 

**Please note**
All my items are handmade, and although I take the greatest of care making them to a good standard, please remember that they are NOT toys and should be kept away from children. Please do not hang mobiles directly above cots or beds.

name: Rainbow rain mobile
description:
Special introductory price £10!!!

May your child's dreams be full of colour, sparkle and wonder with this beautiful mobile. It is made from felt and an invisible thread. The puffy white clouds have a slight shimmer and each raindrop is a different colour of the rainbow :o) 

**New colours**
Now available are gender specific - blue for boys and polkadot pink for girls!! To view, please visit https://www.facebook.com/candyflosscloudsandrainbowrain

Each is handmade and will differ slightly in size and shape, but are approximately 50cm in length (from wooden frame to bottom raindrop) and weighs around 30grams. Please respect that it may take a wee while for your item to arrive if I have a lot of orders to get through, but I will contact you and let you know. 

***Please note***
These items are handmade by myself and although I take the greatest of care to make them to a good standard, please remember that they are NOT a toy and should be kept away from children. Do not hang directly above a cot or bed.

name: Sweet dreams in 8 x 6 frame
description:
Special introductory price £10!! 

This cute picture made from felt in a white 8 x 6 inch frame will look perfect on your little darling's bookshelf or hanging beside their bed, wishing them dreams full of candyfloss clouds and rainbow rain. 

Each fluffy cloud has a slight sparkle and each raindrop is a different colour of the rainbow :o) 

Choose the colour of font you would like - pink, blue, green, orange or black. 

Why not personalise it with your own choice of words? Or choose a different coloured cloud or rain? 

**Please note**
These items are handmade by myself and although i take great care to make them to a good standard, please remember that they are NOT toys and to be kept away from children.

options.name: custom and personalise (do what you like!)

name: Sweet dreams and rainbow rain gift pack
description:
This gift pack includes a rainbow rain mobile and a matching sweet dreams picture frame. 

This would be a perfect gift for a friend with a bump or a new baby. 

All my items are handmade and will differ slightly in size and shape.

**Please note**
These items are handmade by myself and although i take the greatest of care to finish them to good standards, please remember that they are NOT toys and that they should be kept away from children.
